items.title: The boys’ club no one was supposed to write about
items.summary: Reporter Zoë Bernard spent months talking to 51 people (31 of them gay men) to map out a subculture that's been an open secret in Silicon Valley for years: gay men, at the upper echelons of tech, quietly raising up their own networks the way powerful people have always done.

Amazon is currently offering some solid deals on Razer’s Basilisk V3 Pro 35K gaming mouse lineup, including both the standard black/white options and the newer ones with frosted Phantom finishes. The Phantom White variant – which is the newest one of the lot – is now down to its lowest price at $139.99 shipped with the on-page coupon. It typically goes for $170, so that’s a $30 discount on a fairly new model that only debuted towards the end of last year. The rest of them are also all going for $149.99 shipped right now, which also happens to be the lowest we’ve seen the Phantom Green model fetch to date. Head below for more details.
